scripts.migrate:generate: ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile src/config/knexfile.ts migrate:make -x ts
scripts.migrate:run: ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/config/knexfile.ts --env development
